name: Chocolate Crumb Crust
keywords: butter, chocolate wafers, sugar, dessert, side dish, fall
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups ground chocolate wafers (from about 30 cookies)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Combine the chocolate crumbs and sugar in a bowl. Add the butter and stir until well mixed. Press the mixture evenly over the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie plate. Bake for 8 minutes. Set aside to cool.
